charge_type.source:
Count 1 against the 1st defendant, So
So has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown, between two dates, 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: On 2 October 2021, at around 1.30 am, ... She had in her bag 87 plastic bags containing a total of 23.05 grammes of a solid containing a total of 20.44 grammes of cocaine.

role.source: She was added to a WhatsApp group and received instructions through this group. She would receive phone calls or messages from drug suppliers to tell her where to pick up the drugs... She then proceeded to make deliveries as instructed all over Kowloon and New Territories.

mitigating_factors.source: The 1st defendant of 317/2023, So, was 15 at the time of her arrest and is now 19 years old.

After the trial for Fu had been set down, So gave a statement to the police, implicating Fu and agreeing to give evidence against him in his trial... Although she did not ultimately need to give evidence during his trial, I have no doubt that she would have done so without reluctance and come up to proof. She is entitled to a further discount for her cooperation and assistance.

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence...

starting_point.source: For the 1st defendant, So, I will take into account the drugs found on her in her bag and that was 20.44 grammes of cocaine. Now according to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months�imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: For the 1st defendant, So, ... those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months�imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: Therefore, for 317/2023, Count 1 against the 1st defendant, So, I intend to take a starting point of 5 years and 9 months and I will reduce it to 3 years�imprisonment.

charge_type.source:
Count 2 against the 2nd defendant only, Lam
Lam has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine and cannabis in a herbal form with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown between 22 September and 3 October 2021, both dates inclusive, in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: For the 2nd defendant, Lam, I will take into account the cocaine found on him and the cocaine found in the premises rented by Fu and Lam which totals 109.19 grammes of cocaine. There is 6 grammes of herbal cannabis, which I consider de minimis in the circumstances and therefore ignore it.

They also found ... two plastic bags containing a total of 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.
For the 2nd defendant, Lam, ... There is 6 grammes of herbal cannabis, which I consider de minimis in the circumstances and therefore ignore it.

role.source: He was to take it back to the subdivided unit in Mongkok and repackage the drugs into smaller bags... He told the police that both he and Fu met this Siu Wan who offered them both a way to make easy money. He instructed them to rent the subdivided unit and provided money to buy digital scales and plastic bags. Both these defendants did as instructed.

mitigating_factors.source: The 2nd defendant of 317/2023, Lam, was 18 at the time of these offences and still is a student in a vocational education course.

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence...

starting_point.source: For the 2nd defendant, Lam, I will take into account the cocaine found on him and the cocaine found in the premises rented by Fu and Lam which totals 109.19 grammes of cocaine... According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 109.19 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 9 years and 7 months�imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: For the 2nd defendant, Lam, ... those trafficking in 109.19 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 9 years and 7 months�imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: Count 2 against the 2nd defendant, Lam. I intend to take a starting point of 9 years and 6 months�imprisonment and reduce it by 38 months to reflect his plea at the earliest opportunity. Lam is sentenced to 6 years and 4 months�imprisonment.

charge_type.source:
Count 1 against the defendant, Fu
Fu now pleads guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with So and Lam and other persons unknown between 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: For Fu, there is 20.44 grammes of cocaine he admits he delivered to So in relation to the 1st count he faces.

role.source: Apart from messages with So, the police found a WhatsApp group in Fu�s mobile showing members of the WhatsApp group sending out instructions of customers, their drug order, the price to pay and location of delivery. It would appear that he had made deliveries as well... He handed her a bag which she checked and counted, she said contained a total of 95 bags of cocaine.

mitigating_factors.source: Fu of 316/2023 was also 18 at the time of these offences. Fu was also still a student...
I granted him bail to give him a chance to complete his HKDSE examinations and support his mother whilst she received chemotherapy treatment for cancer.

guilty_plea.source: Before his trial, this defendant reconsidered in light of the additional evidence against him and indicated a plea. He has pleaded guilty before me today and admitted the Summary of Facts. I convicted him accordingly.

starting_point.source: For Fu, ... I can quantify a total of 26.63 grammes of cocaine. According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months�imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: For Fu, ... those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months�imprisonment.

final_sentence.source:
Therefore, for 316/2023, Count 1 against Fu. I intend to take a starting point of 6 years and 3 months and I will reduce it by 23 months. Fu is sentenced to 4 years and 4 months�imprisonment for Count 1.
For Count 2, I take the same starting point as Count 1 and reduce it by the same discount, 23 months. For Count 2, this defendant is sentenced to 4 years and 4 months�imprisonment.
For Count 1 and 2, I will order the sentences to run concurrently. Therefore, Fu is sentenced to a total of 4 years and 4 months�imprisonment.

charge_type.source:
Count 2
Fu now pleads guilty to trafficking in dangerous drugs on 3 October 2021 in Room F, 3rd Floor, 59 Prince Edward Road West, Mongkok, Hong Kong, he unlawfully trafficked in 7.2 grammes of a solid containing 6.19 grammes of cocaine and 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.

drugs.source: they searched the premises and found 41 plastic bags containing a total of 7.2 grammes of a solid containing 6.19 grammes of cocaine
and two plastic bags containing a total of 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.

role.source: They used keys found on Fu to gain access to the premises. It was a subdivided unit... They found a tenancy agreement dated 23 September 2021 signed by Fu and the 2nd defendant, Lam, of 317/2023.
